page.title: 04TEACHING MATERIALS
page.content: MATHEMATICS ----------- Compasses,30cm. Metre Rules, 50 m tapes,Weights, Protractors, Trundle Wheels, Rulers, Capacity Apparatus, Fraction Boards, Dienes Multibase , Various small apparatus, Various textbooks. BOOKS ----- Welsh & English, Fiction, Reference, Encyclopaedias, Atlas, Textbooks, Dictionaries, Religious Books, and various other book material. TECHNOLOGY ---------- Electrical apparatus, Costruction apparatus (Lego, Meccano), Levers, Pulleys, Various chemicals, Weights, Magnetic apparatus VARIOUS PHYSICAL EDUCATION APPARATUS.
